attributes.additional_details: Channel 4's decision to broadcast `Call to Prayer ' for Muslims on a daily basis is totally an anti British act and is a racist act towards the British people. I call upon the British people to boycot Channel 4 and ask HM Government to remove their broadcasting licence. I also call upon the authorities to investigate Channel 4's decision to broadact this ` Call to Prayer ' as a provocative, totally racist act and commence a Criminal Investigation.
